TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlCodeExporter extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlCodeExporter extends System.Xml.Serialization.CodeExporter

summary.span: 从 XML 架构元素声明的内部类型映射信息生成类型和特性声明。

span.span: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for XML schema element declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从内部映射到 .NET Framework 类型生成 .NET Framework 类型或属性声明。The class generates .NET Framework types or attribute declarations from internal mappings to .NET Framework types. 这些内部映射由 类为 XSD 文档中定义的元素或 Web 服务描述语言（WSDL）文档中的部件生成。These internal mappings are generated by the class for elements defined in an XSD document or as parts in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 不会直接使用 ;它与 Web 服务描述语言工具（Wsdl.exe）或 XML 架构定义工具（Xsd.exe）一起使用。 is not used directly; it is used with the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe). Wsdl.exe 使用由 生成的类型或属性声明，以及由 类生成的内部映射，从 WSDL 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类。Wsdl.exe uses the types or attribute declarations that are generated by and the internal mappings generated by the class to generate client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a WSDL document. WSDL 文档指定时，wsdl.exe 使用 和 类：Wsdl.exe uses and the class when a WSDL document specifies: - 文本使用，指示 SOAP 消息参数和返回值（或请求和响应文档）的内容通过 XML 架构定义按字面指定。Literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions. - 使用 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的非 SOAP 实现。Non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. - Xsd.exe 使用 从 XML 架构定义（XSD）文档中生成类。Xsd.exe uses to generate classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请不要直接创建 类的实例，而是使用 Web 服务描述语言工具（Wsdl.exe）或 XML 架构定义工具（Xsd.exe）。Instead of creating an instance of the class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).

summary.span: 将 声明添加到对应于 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中 SOAP 消息定义的 元素的方法参数或返回值。

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

param.name: metadata
param.span: 生成类型的 对象的集合，方法向该集合添加特性声明。

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

param.name: member
param.span: WSDL 消息定义中单个元素部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

param.name: ns
param.span: SOAP 消息部分的 XML 命名空间，已为其生成成员参数中的类型映射信息。

span.span: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

summary.span: 将 声明添加到对应于 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中 SOAP 消息定义的 元素的方法参数或返回值。

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 WSDL 文档指定文本使用时，此方法由 Web 服务描述语言工具（Wsdl.exe）使用，指示 SOAP 消息参数和返回值（或请求和响应文档）的内容按原义指定的 XML架构定义。This method is used by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddMappingMetadata (System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping mapping, string ns);

Public Sub AddMappingMetadata (metadata As CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection, mapping As XmlTypeMapping, ns As String)
public: void AddMappingMetadata(System::CodeDom::CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection ^ metadata, System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeMapping ^ mapping, System::String ^ ns);
member this.AddMappingMetadata : System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection * System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping * string -> unit

param.name: metadata
param.span: 生成类型的 对象的集合，方法向该集合添加特性声明。

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

param.name: mapping
param.span: XML 架构元素的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射信息。

span.span: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.

param.name: ns
param.span: SOAP 消息部分的 XML 命名空间，已为其生成成员参数中的类型映射信息。

span.span: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

summary.span: 将 声明添加到对应于 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中非 SOAP 消息定义的 元素的方法返回值。

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method return value that corresponds to a element of a non-SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 WSDL 文档使用 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作指定 Web 服务的 .NET Framework 非 SOAP 实现时，Web 服务描述语言工具（Wsdl.exe）使用此方法。The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies the .NET Framework's non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.

member this.AddMappingMetadata : System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection * System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping * string * bool -> unit

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

param.name: member
param.span: WSDL 消息定义中单个元素部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

param.name: ns
param.span: SOAP 消息部分的 XML 命名空间，已为其生成成员参数中的类型映射信息。

span.span: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

param.name: forceUseMemberName
param.span: 帮助确定是否添加初始参数的标志，其中初始参数包含要生成的特性声明的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: Flag that helps determine whether to add an initial argument containing the XML element name for the attribute declaration being generated.

summary.span: 将 声明添加到对应于 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中 SOAP 消息定义的 元素的方法参数或返回值。

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言工具（Wsdl.exe）在 WSDL 文档指定文本使用时使用此方法，这表示 SOAP 消息参数和返回值（或请求和响应文档）的内容按字面指定了 XML架构定义。The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.

param.span: WSDL 消息定义中元素部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: The internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

summary.span: 为属于 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的 SOAP 消息定义的每个部分生成 .NET Framework 类型和特性声明。

span.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言工具（Wsdl.exe）在 WSDL 文档指定文本使用时使用此方法，这表示 SOAP 消息参数和返回值（或请求和响应文档）的内容按字面指定了 XML架构定义。The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ExportTypeMapping (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping xmlTypeMapping);
.method public hidebysig instance void ExportTypeMapping(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping xmlTypeMapping) cil managed
Public Sub ExportTypeMapping (xmlTypeMapping As XmlTypeMapping)
public: void ExportTypeMapping(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeMapping ^ xmlTypeMapping);
member this.ExportTypeMapping : System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping -> unit

param.name: xmlTypeMapping
param.span: XML 架构元素的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射信息。

span.span: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.

summary.span: 为 XMl 架构元素生成 .NET Framework 类型和特性声明。

span.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for an XML schema element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言工具（Wsdl.exe）使用此方法在以下情况下生成 SOAP 消息头和返回类型： Web 服务描述语言（WSDL）文档使用 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 指定 Web 服务的非 SOAP 实现运算符.The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method to generate SOAP message headers and return types when a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document specifies non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. XML 架构定义工具（Xsd.exe）使用此方法生成 XML 架构定义（XSD）文档中的每个 XML 架构元素声明。The XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe) uses this method to generate each of the XML schema element declarations in an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document.

summary.span: 此 API 支持 .NET Framework 基础结构，但不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
